judge: Game Preparation - Judge - The game has started. Players, confirm your identities.
Day 1,Night - Judge - Night has fallen, werewolves please choose a target.
Day 1,Daytime - Judge - Those who died last night are [4]
Day 1,Daytime - Judge - Starting from [6], please give the last words
Day 2,Night - Judge - Night has fallen, special roles please act
Day 2,Daytime - Judge - Those who died last night are [3]
Day 3,Night - Judge - Night has fallen, players in the open-eyes camp please start taking action
task: Medic choose one player to protect
Seer choose one player to inspect
Medic choose one player to protect
Seer choose one player to inspect

Day 1 Daytime - [1] is speaking.text: Losing our seer hurts. I noticed players two and five exchanging glances before nightfall.
Day 1 Daytime - [1] is speaking.summary: Player 1 points suspicion at players 2 and 5 after the seer's death.

Day 1 Daytime - [2] is speaking.text: I defended myself in the night vote. Focus on the quiet ones. Player six hasn't offered a single idea.
Day 1 Daytime - [2] is speaking.summary: Player 2 deflects suspicion and targets player 6.

Day 1 Daytime - [6] is speaking.text: I was taking notes. I am the medic and I saved player one. Eliminate player two before we lose another night.
Day 1 Daytime - [6] is speaking.summary: Player 6 claims to be the medic and urges a vote on player 2.

Day 2 Daytime - [5] is speaking.text: We eliminated the fake medic. Player one continues to stir fear; follow the trail and end the day quickly.
Day 2 Daytime - [5] is speaking.summary: Player 5 frames player 1 as manipulative and pushes for a fast vote.
